desc: At Pearline’s Apothecary we specialize in handmade plant-based soaps. Our soaps are crafted in small batches to ensure quality and attention to detail. We use natural colorants and a variety of essential oils that offer therapeutic and aromatherapy benefits.

layout.text:
All of our products are plant-based and crafted in small batches to ensure quality and attention to detail.

*Not affiliated with Pearline Iconic New York Soap Co.
